# isNode

> Check if the runtime is [Node.js][node-js].


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var isNode = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-node' );
```

#### isNode

`Boolean` indicating if the runtime is [Node.js][node-js].

``` javascript
var bool = isNode;
// returns <boolean>
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var isNode = require( '@stdlib/utils/is-node' );

console.log( isNode );
// => <boolean>
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->


<section class="links">

[node-js]: https://nodejs.org/en/

</section>

<!-- /.links -->
